category.name: Test Case 2, Follows, Parent, Modifies, Uses for single while loop

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(2, s);
stmt s; Select s such that Follows(2,s);

id.comment: Which statement is a parent of statement #2?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s,2);

id.comment: Which statement(s) is/are the child of statement #1?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(1,s);

id.comment: Which statement(s) is/are the child/grandchild of statement #1?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(1, s);
stmt s1,s2; Select s1 such that Parent(s1, s2);
assign a; stmt s; Select a such that Parent(s, a);

id.comment: What variable(s) is/are modified by statement #1?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(1, v);

id.comment: What variable(s) is/are used by statement #1?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses(1, v);
